alert.note: Alert for Humacao; Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 01 at 10:26AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Humacao and Naguabo. * WHEN...Until 1230 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 923 AM AST, Emergency management reported flooding in the warned area. Exit 22, connecting PR-53 to PR-31 is closed as PR-31 is impassable. USGS river sensors indicate that Rio Blanco is out of its banks with moderate flooding stage. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen and excessive runoff persists. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
